member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController
member.summary: A Class which defines various options to export the SfDataGrid to an excel worksheets. Provides classes, methods, properties and events to export and customize the exported values of a SfDataGrid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.CellExporting
member.summary: Occurs when the cell is being exported to excel.
member.remarks: This event is raised while exporting a cell at the execution time before the cell is exported.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.RowExporting
member.summary: Occurs when the row is being exported to excel.
member.remarks: This event is raised while exporting a row at the execution time before the row is exported.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportToExcel(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid)
member.summary: Exports the data in the grid to the excel work sheet based on default export option and returns the excel engine.
member.returns: The ExcelEngine for exporting the data in the SfDataGrid to the excel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportToExcel(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption)
member.summary: Exports the data in the grid to the excel work sheet based on the given export option and returns the excel engine.
member.param: The containing the additional options for customizing the data in the grid when exporting to excel.
member.returns: The ExcelEngine for exporting the data in the grid to the excel.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportToExcel(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.ICollectionViewAdv,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption,Syncfusion.XlsIO.IWorksheet)
member.summary: Exports the data in the grid to the given excel work sheet based on given export option and returns the excel worksheet.
member.param: The underlying collection of the SFDataGrid.
The containing the additional options for customizing the data in the grid when exporting to excel.
The worksheet for exporting the data in the grid to the excel.
member.returns: The worksheet containing the exported data in the grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportToExcel(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.ICollectionViewAdv,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption)

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportExcelToWorkSheet(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.ICollectionViewAdv,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption)
member.summary: Exports grid to the Worksheet based on the export option.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportRecordsToExcel(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.IRecordsEntryList,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Exports records to the excel, exporting styles are applied for whole record region instead of the the single cell. Grid style is applied for records only when record style is not assigned in export option.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportRecordToExcel(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.RecordEntry,Syncfusion.XlsIO.IRange,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption,System.Object)
member.summary: Exports a record to the excel worksheet. GridRowExcelExporting Event handler for record is handled here. When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call ExportRecordToExcel

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportCellValue(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.RecordEntry,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.GridColumn,Syncfusion.XlsIO.IRange,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption,System.Object)
member.summary: Exports cell value to the excel, cell value are obtained from the record using gridcolumn mappping name. when exporting each cell exporting event handler is called. For image column, image is converted as stream and then image will exports. For switch column, check box will export. When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call ExportCellValue

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingController.ExportCellFormat(Syncfusion.XlsIO.IRange,System.Object,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.GridColumn)
member.summary: Applies the cell format for the cell area based on grid column format such as currency ,percentage , date time etc...

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the groups in the SfdataGrid should export with expand/collapse options or not.
member.value: The boolean value indicating whether the groups in the SfdataGrid should export with expand/collapse options or not. True if the SfdataGrid should export the groups with expand/collapse option, otherwise false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridExcelExportingOption.ExcelVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the excel version for exporting the data to the excel. The user can customize the exporting workbook version by using this property.
member.value: The excel workbook version in which the data in the grid is to be exported. The default value is .

member.value: The starting column index of the excel from which the data in the grid is to be exported. The default value is 1.

member.value: A boolean value specifying whether the grid style of the SfdataGrid need to be exported or not. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Grid Styles are not exported when user sets the properties like , , , etc for exporting.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportingController
member.summary: A Class which defines various options to export the SfDataGrid to a PDF. Provides classes, methods, properties and events to export and customize the exported values of a SfDataGrid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportingController.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportingController.CellExporting
member.summary: Occurs when the cell is being exported to pdf.
member.remarks: This event is raised while exporting a cell at the execution time before the cell is exported.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportingController.RowExporting
member.summary: Occurs when the row is being exported to pdf.
member.remarks: This event is raised while exporting a row at the execution time before the row is exported.

member.name: E:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportingController.HeaderAndFooterExporting
member.summary: Occurs when header and footer is being exported to the pdf.
member.remarks: This event allows the user to customize the header and footer of the exported PDF.

member.summary: Gets or private sets the exporing PdfGrid

member.returns: The PdfDocument containing the exported data in the grid.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportingController.ExportCellValue(Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.RecordEntry,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.GridColumn,Syncfusion.Pdf.Grid.PdfGridCell,Syncfusion.SfDataGrid.Exporting.DataGridPdfExportOption,System.Object)
member.summary: Exports cellvalue to the pdf document, cellvalue are obtained from the record using gridcolumn mappping name. when exporting each cell cellexporting event handler is called. For image column, image is converted as stream and then image will export. For switch column, check box will export. When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call ExportCellValue
